          <title>
            <string language="et">Värvi- ja vormiõpetus</string>
            <string language="en">Color- and form education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe und Formularausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de couleur et de forme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução da cor e do formulário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione della forma e di colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρώμα - και μορφής εκπαίδευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Educación del color y de la forma</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">PowerPoint esitlus tutvustab järgmisi teemasid: põhivärve, vikerkaarevärve, ring, kuup, ruut jt. kujundeid.</string>
            <string language="en">PowerPoint presentation about the following topics: main colours, rainbow colours, circle, square, cube and other shapes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Kunst</string>
            <string language="et">Kunstiõpetus</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="en">Art education</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PowerPoint Darstellung über die folgenden 
Themen: Hauptfarben, Regenbogenfarben, Kreis, Quadrat, Würfel 
und anderer formt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de PowerPoint au sujet des sujets 
suivants : les couleurs principales, les couleurs d'arc-en-ciel,
le cercle, la place, le cube et autre forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de PowerPoint sobre os seguintes 
tópicos: as cores principais, as cores do arco-íris, o 
círculo, o quadrado, o cubo e outro dão forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione del PowerPoint circa i seguenti 
soggetti: i colori principali, i colori del Rainbow, il cerchio,
il quadrato, il cubo ed altro modella.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PowerPoint παρουσίαση για τα ακόλουθα θέματα: 
βασικά χρώματα, χρώματα ουράνιων τόξων, κύκλος, 
τετράγωνο, κύβος και άλλες μορφές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de PowerPoint sobre los asuntos 
siguientes: los colores principales, los colores del arco iris, 
el círculo, el cuadrado, el cubo y otro forma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
